headline: Ulta Beauty to Enter the UAE at Mall of the Emirates as Expansion in the Middle East Continues in Partnership With Alshaya Group
summary: BOLINGBROOK, Ill., January 23, 2026--Ulta Beauty, the largest specialty beauty retailer in the United States, is set to make its debut in the United Arab Emirates with the opening of its store in Mall of the Emirates on January 29, 2026 in partnership with Alshaya Group, one of the world’s leading international retail franchise operators. Marking a major milestone in Ulta Beauty’s global expansion building on from the first store opening in Kuwait on November 7, 2025, the Mall of the Emirates op

headline: Earnings Preview: What To Expect From Ulta Beauty's Report
summary: Ulta Beauty is scheduled to report its fourth-quarter results soon, and analysts expect a double-digit earnings drop.

headline: How Ulta Beauty’s New Wellness and Nail Partnerships Could Shape Ulta Beauty (ULTA) Investors’ Outlook
summary: In January 2026, Stripes Beauty announced its official launch at Ulta Beauty’s Wellness by Ulta Beauty boutiques, while Olive & June revealed a nationwide rollout into 600 Ulta stores and ulta.com, expanding access to midlife wellness solutions and at-home nail care. Together with the rapid sellout of Ulta Beauty World 2026, these moves underline Ulta Beauty’s ability to turn brand partnerships and experiential events into powerful customer engagement engines across wellness, nails, and...
